Name: Kingslayer: The First Assassin
About the game: Before you find the King's Room, you need to beat guards and traps. Feel like an assassin in this limited grid-movement and attacks puzzle game. Invade the royal castle in this minimalist limited movement puzzle game. The Gameplay Move the assassin to pass throughout the level with limited movements to get to the King's Room. You will need to attack! Every level you have a specific quantity of daggers to use in the enemies. Key Features - Dark fantasy atmospheric minimalist visuals - 28 hand-craft levels - Original acoustic guitar soundtrack - Design for keyboard and mouse, but with movement and restart comands for gamepads.
